entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area in the afternoon. High 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to 18 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area in the evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 18 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
